WorkItem.ClosedComment: VR Player 0.5 has been released with the bug fix
WorkItem.Description:
Issue:
When pressing the spacebar to restart a video after a video has finished playing, VR Player will begin playing the first video played in a session. 

Steps taken to experience issue:

1. Open VR Player
2. Open a video
3. Play and let video finish
4. Open a different video
5. Play Video and let video finish
6. Press spacebar
7. Bug Occurs: The first video starts playing again.

I'm working my way through the code slowly, but I wasn't quite able to pinpoint where the error occurred. 

As always well done with the program!
WorkItem.Summary: VR Player v0.41 Small Bug: Restarting Video

Comments.Message:
This problem was caused by VLC mediaplugin adding files in its internal playlist when loading a new video.
In VR Player version 0.5, I am now clearing the playlist each time.
